14.3. Model Evaluation Test Harness 253
Each time step of the test dataset is enumerated. A prediction is made using the ﬁt model.
Again, we will deﬁne a generic function named model predict() that takes the ﬁt model, the
history, and the model conﬁguration and makes a single one-step prediction.
# forecast with a pre-fit model
def model_predict(model, history, config):
return 0.0
